Translations.Text: Zhe shi yin wei an la jiushi zhen zai, ta que neng shi sizhe sheng, ta dui wanshi que shi wanneng de.
Fuhuo de shijian kending shi yao lailin de, zhe shi wuyi de, an la bi jiang fuhuo fenmu li de renmen.
Renmen zhong youren zhenglun an la, ji wu zhishi, ye wei shou yindao, qie meiyou yi bu [cong an la jiang shi de] guangming de jingdian.
Ta aoman [zhu] er bu huitou [yuanli an la zhi dao], yibian shi renmen beili an la zhi dao. Ta zai jinshi jiang shou lingru, fuhuo ri, wo hai yao shi ta changshi [huo yu li] shaozhuo de xingfa.
[You hua sheng shuo]:“Zhe shi youyu ni qinshou suo zuo de zui'e. An la jue bu kuidai ta de puren.”

Renmen zhong youren zai xinyang de bianyuan [huaiyi] shang chongbai an la, jiaru yi jian haoshi jianglin ta, ta jiu xinmanyizu [de chongbai an la]; jiaru yi jian zainan jianglin ta, ta jiu qingshuai de beipan [an la]. Ta shiqule jinshi he houshi. Zhe jiushi mingxian de sunshi.
Ta she an la er qiqiu dui ta ji wu hai ye wuyi de dongxi. Zhe jiushi ji shen de mi wu [zhu].
Ta qiqiu dui ta bi dayu li de dongxi. Ta de baohu zhe zhen elie! Ta de huoban zhen elie!
An la bi shi xinyang bing xingshan zhe jinru zhu heliuguo de leyuan. An la dique zuo suo yu zuo de.
Shei caixiang an la zai jinshi he houshi dou bu yuanzhu ta [mu sheng], shei dang xuanliang zijin, dang rang ta kan yi kan ta de jimou neng fou xiaochu ta de kuangnu.
